topics.body: Do black girl's vaginas taste like chocolate?
topics.author: 50b70eeb7f123b1a02000097

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5386cdec6368726645990400#post_5386cdec6368726645990400
Glad to hear that. 

"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5386cdb36368726888650400#post_5386cdb36368726888650400
I have mixed feelings about the idea of a Vietnam, or even or Korean war games.

On the one hand I truly do believe that as time goes on these conflicts should not be exempt from examination in any form of art, but on the other hand too many of my friends are Veterans of those wars and their pain is too vivid for me to get any enjoyment out of such a game.*

Because I am a hypocrite I do not mind games made out of the two wars I was in (OIF and OEF) largely because their depiction in games is so far from reality that all I can do is laugh.
